about.title: What We Do
about.text: WebSavvys is not a generic web service. We create custom-built websites and web applications tailored specifically for your business goals. Every project is unique, designed with modern technologies, clean architecture, and built to scale as you grow. We focus on performance, user experience, and long-term maintainability.

flow.title: How We Work
flow.subtitle: A transparent, step-by-step process designed for clarity and results.

steps.title: Discovery & Consultation
steps.description: We start with an online meeting to understand your business, goals, and project requirements. This is where we align on vision and scope.

steps.title: Planning & Strategy
steps.description: We create a detailed project plan, define features, choose the right tech stack, and establish timelines and milestones.

steps.title: UI/UX Design
steps.description: Our design phase focuses on creating intuitive, beautiful interfaces. You'll see mockups and prototypes before any code is written.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: We build your project using modern, scalable technologies. You'll receive regular updates and have full visibility into progress.

steps.title: Testing & Revisions
steps.description: Rigorous testing across devices and browsers. We refine based on your feedback until everything is perfect.

steps.title: Launch & Delivery
steps.description: We handle hosting, deployment, and go-live. Your project launches smoothly, and we provide documentation and support.

payment.title: Payment Terms

payment.note: We believe in transparency. You'll know exactly what you're paying for, with no hidden fees or surprise costs.

items.q: How long does a typical project take?
items.a: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. A standard website takes 3–6 weeks, while more complex web applications can take 8–12 weeks. Timeline depends on content readiness, feedback speed, and feature requirements.

items.q: Do I need technical knowledge to work with you?
items.a: Not at all. We handle all technical aspects and explain everything in clear, simple terms. You'll always understand what's happening, what decisions need to be made, and why they matter for your project.

items.q: Can you work with my existing brand or content?
items.a: Absolutely. We can integrate your existing brand guidelines, content, and visual assets. If you need a fresh look, we can create that too. We adapt to your needs.

items.q: Will my site be fast and mobile-friendly?
items.a: Yes, guaranteed. Every project is built mobile-first and optimized for performance. We test across all devices and browsers to ensure fast load times, smooth interactions, and excellent user experience everywhere.

items.q: What happens after the project is delivered?
items.a: You receive full documentation, training if needed, and ongoing support options. We're here to help with updates, maintenance, or future enhancements as your business grows.

items.q: How do you handle communication during the project?
items.a: We maintain regular communication through your preferred channels — email, WhatsApp, or video calls. You'll receive progress updates, have opportunities for feedback, and can reach us anytime with questions.
